name: Bycatch
description:
You are the Fisher. Burdened by a curse to find things better left lost, you make the choices you can, and wonder if any of it will make a difference in the end.

As the Fisher, you will bestow or withhold the cursed objects you fish every day. At the end of three days, you will see through the consequences of your actions. Or will you?

Done for the Global Game Jam 2021.
